plot: A memory. Is it a perfect recollection of an event, or a story twisted by time, conscience and ego? How would you remember the night you were mugged?
title: Mugged
plot_es: A memory. Is it a perfect recollection of an event, or a story twisted by time, conscience and ego? How would you remember the night you were mugged?
